Author: Kieran Flanagan
Profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kieranjflanagan?miniProfileUrn=urn%3Ali%3Afsd_profile%3AACoAAADX3B8BVMBeNYgn3W8YsejHa1Ks7vr_5ko

OpenAI is hiring its first content strategist for ChatGPT.com. It highlights why content is still one of the most valuable skills a marketer can master. 

Some skills are timeless; content is one of those. 

AI is leading to the creation of huge amounts of content across various channels. It's VERY hard to stand out above the noise. 

But, truly great content creators will do that, they'll build audience and influence, two of the most valuable assets you can own right now.

AI is a great writing assistant. But, ChatGPT still want a human to:

- Run point on content strategy
- Develop messaging
- Develop tone and voice
- Bring the product to life across channels using content

AI can help a person do this, but it can't do it for them, unless you want very average results.

Content is still a (AI assists / Humans craft the real value) relationship.
